duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares all market-ready apartments, including painting, carpet cleaning/repair, general repairs, and housekeeping to ensure a quality product for residents.
Completes resident service requests in a timely manner.

Knowledge of various maintenance functions including plumbing, pool maintenance, air conditioning, heating, general carpentry skills, appliance repair, electrical maintenance, painting, caulking, snow removal, scheduling, and life safety issues.
Maintains grounds, pools/hot tubs, common areas, and dog parks to keep them clean, free of trash, debris, and other safety issues.
Performs on-call emergency procedures as required.
Reports maintenance issues that affect the budget such as life safety, vacant repairs, property damages, and common area needs to the manager.
Schedules and performs preventative maintenance and records such activities.
Is knowledgeable of state, local, and federal housing laws, codes, policies, and systems regarding maintenance.
Attends and participates in training programs as required by the company and local city and state jurisdictions.
Provides superior customer service and represents the company in a professional manner at all times.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, Trade, Technical, or Vocational school
